p: Based on the evidence of a rapidly increasing incidence of infections and the possibility of transmission by asymptomatic carriers, SARS-CoV-2 can be transmitted effectively among humans and exhibits high potential for a pandemic [ 6, 33- 36]. Additionally, the advancement and convenience of global travel could further facilitate the worldwide spread of SARS-CoV-2 [ 34, 37]. The possibility of feco-oral transmission of SARS-CoV-2 has public health implications, especially in areas with poor sanitation [ 38].
